about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Broken Minds — approximately an hour and seven minutes of music.

Composed by OddTillTheEnd

Tracks have been modified to have endings instead of looping.

Special Content

  • Extended versions of the OP and ED
  • Theme from the first trailer
  • A bonus, unused track
